name: Organic Fertilizer
description: Natural fertilizer made from plant matter
instructions: Apply 2 cups per plant every month.

name: Insecticide Spray
description: Effective spray to eliminate common garden pests
instructions: Spray directly on affected areas every 2 weeks.

name: Slow-Release Fertilizer
description: Granules that release nutrients over time
instructions: Use 1 tablespoon per plant every 3 months.

name: Fungicide Powder
instructions: Apply powder to leaves during early signs of infection.

name: Compost
description: Nutrient-rich compost made from organic waste
instructions: Spread 1 inch around the base of each plant.
